bike.description: Blend of high and mid modulus carbon fiber, Dyad Elite M30/T700 lay-up, tri-oval shaped top and down tubes with SST tubing diameters and ACE internal cables compatible with Di2, Carbon 1 1/8-1 1/2" head tube, Carbon PressFit 30 BB shell, asymmetrical chainstays, twin SST seat stays with hidden carrier/fender eyelets, forged one-piece dropouts with replaceable derailleur hanger

components.description: Jamis ECO carbon composite fork, 1.5" hollow formed crown, monocoque one-piece forming technology, alloy dropouts with hidden eyelet
Ritchey Pro Drop-In, sealed bearing with nylon upper Compression ring,1 1/8-1 1/2"
Shimano RS61 Tubeless wheelset, 16/20H, 24mm asymmetric rim profile, RS61 forged aluminum loose ball hubs and double butted bladed stainless steel spokes
Shimano 11-Speed Ultegra RD-6800 rear and Ultegra FD-6800 braze-on front with 34.9mm alloy clamp
Shimano Ultegra ST-6800 Dual Control STI, 22-Speed
FSA PressFit 30 with Wheels MFG adaptors
TRP RG957 long reach dual pivot calipers with CNC cartridge pads and with Shimano Ultegra ST-6800 STI brake levers
Ritchey Comp Logic Curve, 6061 aluminum, 31.8 x 400mm (48/51), 420mm (54/56), 440mm (58/61)
Ritchey Comp 4-Axis, 3D net forged 6061 alloy, 6JAMIS_DEGREE x 90mm (48/51), 100mm (54/56), 120mm (58/61)
Jamis gel suede tape with Jamis logo, gel inserts on top bar and "J" end plug
Ritchey Pro Carbon, 31.6 x 350mm with Jamis 7075-AL CNC aluminum 1-bolt seat post clamp
Selle San Marco SPID Dynamic Open with Microfeel+Kev+HF cover and hollow chromoly-moly rails
